content:
FXR Supplemental Data

Included here is Chip-Seq raw and processed data from:
Genome-Wide Interrogation of Hepatic FXR Reveals an Asymmetric IR-1 Motif
and Synergy with LRH-1

Hansook Kim Chong, Aniello M. Infante, Young-Kyo Seo, Tae-Il Jeon, Yanqiao Ahang,Peter Edwards, Xiaohui Xie, and Timothy F. Osborne


Paper submitted to Nucleic Acids Research
Data Included Here:
  • Bed files of aligned reads for both FXR and IgG
  • Primer list for manual ChIP confirmation
  • FXR alpha2 micro-array
  • A list of the genes nearest to each called FXR peak
